title: No, Sam Bankman-Fried Is Not Being Bailed Out By Democrats
description: Republican candidate Vivek Rameswamy is rightly furious over dropped campaign finance charges. But the charges are likely to return after a procedural adjustment - and claims of corruption do more harm than good.
